characters.name: Spider-Man
characters.description: Agile and fearless, Spider-Man is a popular and well-known superhero, adored by children who aspire to be like him.

characters.name: Pirates
characters.description: Pirates who will create a real sea adventure and a treasure hunt!

characters.name: Hunter and Dinosaur
characters.description: This is an educational-entertainment program with quest elements. Children will embark on a journey to find clues, each leading to exciting tasks. The goal is to solve all the puzzles and bring a real Dinosaur to life!

characters.name: Snow White
characters.description: The kind and endlessly friendly heroine of the Disney cartoon.

characters.name: Bunny
characters.description: Our bunny hopped through the magical forest and accidentally arrived at the children's party. Now, together with the kids, he will embark on a real, amazing journey.

characters.name: Transformer Bumblebee
characters.description: Bumblebee is one of the most brave and agile Autobots. This Transformer has many human qualities. He loves to smile, sing, and dance.

characters.name: Chase (Racer)
characters.description: Together with Chase, children can become brave heroes of the rescue team, overcoming many obstacles through play.

characters.name: Winged Unicorn
characters.description: Winged unicorns live in a fairy-tale land. They bring happiness and can make the most cherished wishes come true.

characters.name: Fixies
characters.description: Fixies Simka, Nolik, and Shpula will delight your little one with incredible adventures. And who are Fixies? A Big-Big Secret?? Not at all!

characters.name: Safari
characters.description: This is an educational-entertainment program with quest elements where children solve puzzles to bring a real dinosaur to life!

characters.name: Elsa
characters.description: Elsa, the Queen of Arendelle, born with the gift of creating snow and ice, will make sure your child never gets bored.

characters.name: Pirate
characters.description: Together with the Pirate, the party guests will embark on pirate adventures and overcome many challenges.

characters.name: Superman
characters.description: The Superman animator will guide the children through superhero school so they can help fight the villains.

characters.name: Squid Game
characters.description: Based on the series, we have prepared an outdoor quest 'Squid Game' and an animation program of the same name.

characters.name: Minnie Mouse
characters.description: Everyone’s favorite – the mischievous Minnie. She has been known to everyone for over half a century!

characters.name: Caramelka
characters.description: Caramelka is a brave, energetic, and fun character who will cheer up everyone at the children's party.

characters.name: Iron Man
characters.description: Iron Man is gathering new Avengers and preparing to save the world from villains.

characters.name: Kukutiki
characters.description: The cute and kind Kukutiki characters will fill the children's party with fun songs.

characters.name: Ladybug
characters.description: The cheerful and brave Marinette, known as Ladybug, is already on her way to the party!

characters.name: LOL Doll
characters.description: The bright, lively, and cheerful LOL doll is a modern favorite animation character.

characters.name: Ninja Turtle
characters.description: Together with the turtle Michelangelo, the guests will participate in an unusual game program.

characters.name: Pink Unicorn
characters.description: A birthday party in the Unicorn style – an event wrapped in good magic and fairy-tale adventures.

characters.name: TikTok
characters.description: Together, we'll create a TikTok House! Participants can enjoy challenges, games, and dancing!

characters.name: Superwoman
characters.description: Superwoman, a loyal companion of Superman, is a strong and cheerful heroine.

characters.name: Teddy Bear
characters.description: The fluffiest character – a cute and joyful teddy bear who will leave no one indifferent.

characters.name: Wednesday
characters.description: The mysterious girl from the Addams family. She has psychic abilities, making her even more captivating and mysterious.

characters.name: Unicorn
characters.description: The unicorn will create a festive mood and leave no one indifferent at your party.

characters.name: LOL Unicorn Doll
characters.description: The lovely and stylish unicorn doll has become very popular among girls, as with this fashionista, they can unleash any creative idea.

characters.name: Cinderella
characters.description: The humble stepdaughter will find a magical crown at your party and transform into a gorgeous princess.

characters.name: Fairy
characters.description: A wonderful and magical party hosted by the kind and charming Fairy.

characters.name: Pinkie Pie
characters.description: The delightful Pinkie Pie is loved for her playful and kind-hearted nature, and every child dreams of meeting her in person.

characters.name: Indian
characters.description: Many generations have loved playing as Indians. Books and movies have been made about how children, and even some adults, enjoy playing Indian games.

characters.name: Troll Poppy
characters.description: Poppy is well-known to every child. The troll with the lovely name Poppy embodies a fun, playful, and innocent girl.
